body.name: 17 Inch Tall Two-Piece Elongated Toilet, ADA Extra Tall Toilets with Powerful Single Flush 1.28 GPF，12 Inch Rough in Toilet Elongated(Toilet Seat Included)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 41 mins
features: 【COMFORTABLE ADA HEIGHT TOILET】：ADA toilet's seat height is set to ADA-compliant standards, providing maximum comfort during use. With their carefully contoured seats and optimal sitting height, you can bid farewell to uncomfortable bathroom visits once and for all.

【POWER SIPHON FLUSHING】: This elongated toilet features Power siphon flushing technology, which uses powerful jets of water to clear waste and keep the toilet bowl clean. This flushing mechanism is highly effective and efficient, helping to reduce water usage and ensure maximum hygiene.

【PREMIUM QUALITY】：The two-piece toilet is crafted with durable ceramic. This ensures its longevity and resistance to stains, scratches, and wear. The high-quality construction not only adds to the toilet's aesthetic appeal but also makes it easy to clean and maintain, providing a long-lasting and hygienic solution for your bathroom.

【ELONGATED BOWL】：This tall toilet features an elongated bowl design, providing added comfort and a more ergonomic seating experience. The elongated shape offers extra room and support, making it suitable for individuals of all sizes.

【EASY INSTALLATION】:Our two-piece toilets are designed for hassle-free installation. With clear instructions and all the necessary hardware included, you can quickly set up your new toilet. Additionally, the sleek design of our toilets ensures easy cleaning and maintenance, taking the stress out of bathroom upkeep.

【2 YEARS QUALITY GUARANTEE】: If you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact us, we will reply you as soon as possible within 24 hours. We promise that we will be responsible for solving any quality problems for you within 2 years.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We are thrilled to introduce our latest addition to the bathroom essentials collection - the sleek and efficient two-piece toilet. Designed with both style and functionality in mind, our two-piece toilets offer a superior bathroom experience that will elevate your home to a whole new level of sophistication.

Durability and Reliability We take pride in offering high-quality products that stand the test of time. Crafted from durable materials, our two-piece toilets are built to last. You can trust in their long-lasting performance and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a reliable bathroom fixture. Water Efficiency We understand the importance of sustainable living, and our two-piece toilets lead the way in water conservation. Equipped with advanced flushing systems, they use significantly less water per flush while maintaining excellent performance. By choosing our two-piece toilets, you contribute to a greener future while saving on your water bills. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As one gets older a higher seat is a must.Now this does work but not much water means more cleaning most every time. (Higer cost.)I`ve never really had a toilet that was difficult to install.I will add a bidet seat to this.So far this is working pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars scrub after every dump
reviews.reviewText: This toilet has a very small water pool. Maybe 6". in diameter. the result being every poop doesn't hit the pool but lands on the dry ceramic above the pool requiring a scrub to remove it. There is no swirl of water on a flush . It goes straight down and doesn't remove the poop. So you have to brush the poop off the back wall on every dump. The flush doesn't use much water so this is the result.
